title: Nuveen Georgia Quality Municipal Income Fund (NKG) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen Georgia Quality Municipal Income Fund ( NKG  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.037 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased NKG prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 7th quarter that NKG has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $12.52, the dividend yield is 3.55%.
The previous trading day's last sale of NKG was $12.52, representing a -1.42% decrease from the 52 week high of $12.70 and a 17.67% increase over the 52 week low of $10.64.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the NKG Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
